articles.description: Reaction to Champions League wins for Barcelona and Atletico Madrid, and build-up to Thursday's Europa League and Conference games.
articles.title: Champions League reaction as Barcelona beat PSG, and build-up to Liverpool and West Ham's Europa League games

articles.description: Ronda Rousey - judoka, mixed martial artist, wrestler - tells BBC Sport how she has found inner peace after coming back from the lowest point of her career.
articles.title: Ronda Rousey: How former UFC fighter found solace and inner peace

articles.description: The start of the 2024 Masters on Thursday is set to be disrupted with thunderstorms forecast to hit Augusta National.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Storms set to disrupt opening round at Augusta National

articles.description: Barcelona and PSG refuse to speak to a Spanish broadcaster after comments made about midfielder Lamine Yamal.
articles.title: Barca & PSG boycott TV network over Yamal remark

articles.description: An arrest warrant is issued for Kansas City Chiefs wide receiver Rashee Rice after he was involved a hit-and-run crash that injured four people.
articles.title: Rashee Rice: Arrest warrant issued for Kansas City Chiefs wide receiver over crash

articles.description: Last year's winner Corach Rambler heads the runners for Saturday's Grand National after the final line-up is confirmed.
articles.title: Grand National 2024: Corach Rambler favourite for repeat Aintree victory

articles.description: As Jurgen Klopp nears the end of his tenure at Liverpool, BBC Sport visits Anfield to analyse the impact of the German on the club, the city, and discuss how the Reds will handle his impeding departure.
articles.title: 'Things will never be the same again' - Can Liverpool thrive after Klopp?

articles.description: Burnley manager Vincent Kompany is given a two-match touchline suspension after his red card against Chelsea.
articles.title: Burnley boss Kompany given two-match touchline ban

articles.description: Nikola Jokic scores 41 points against the Minnesota Timberwolves as the Denver Nuggets reclaim pole position in the Western Conference.
articles.title: NBA: Nikola Jokic stars as Denver Nuggets beat Minnesota Timberwolves to top Western Conference

articles.description: Can you name every batter to score 300 or more runs in an individual Test innings?
articles.title: Quiz: Name every batter to score 300+ in Test innings
